SEARCH
Package Characters

Class GameCharacter

java.lang.Object
Characters.GameCharacter
Direct Known Subclasses:
Cyborg, Monster, Punishment
public abstract class GameCharacter extends Object
GameCharacter is an abstract class that represents a character in the game. It holds a position and has methods to get and set the position, to move the character, and to get the sprite (image) of the character.
